Intro.Title: Initial Setup
Intro.Description:
This wizard will help you link OBS with the plugin.
IMPORTANT: You must install the latest version of
Intro.Description2: for this plugin to work. After installing, Enable the WebSockets server through the Tools->"WebSockets Server Settings" menu in OBS before continuing.

Pairing.Title: Link Account
Pairing.Description:
Note: It is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED you also set a password when enabling the WebSockets server through OBS.
The 'Ip' and 'Port' should be kept as is, unless you made changes through OBS. If you created a password, please input it below

Result.ValidateDescription: This should take up to 5 seconds...
Result.SuccessDescription: You may now close this window and start using the plugin
Result.FailDescription: We failed to save the settings. Please try again.
